name: Cat Herder - THE CATPOCALYPSE
description: NOTE: I've updated it! Choose HTML5 to play the updated version The Cat Herder faces his toughest challenge yet!  Cat sitting for Mrs Wigglesworth while she buys more catnip. All seems quiet... too quiet. Are you prepared for THE CATPOCALYPSE?!?! My first game! Made for Ludum Dare 39! Enjoy! Controls WSAD to move Update Details - Added Intro, Menu & Game Over Screens - Added Difficulty Levels - New Larger Map - Bug Fixes - Balancing (Collision, performance and new artwork are next on the update list!) Download the Windows version for the original LD39 entry. Any and all feedback is welcome, especially if it includes bad cat puns.
